Container.Name: ArmaReforger
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install an Arma Reforger server and run it.
**ATTENTION:** First startup can take a long time since it downloads the server files and installs the runtimes!
Update Notice: Simply restart the container if a newer version of the game is available.
Additional server configuration can be modified in default-config.json, located in the server installation directory, but the environment variables will override if they are available to be set.

Config.Name: Game ID
Config.Description: The game ID that the container download at startup. (https://steamdb.info/)

Config.Name: Server Name
Config.Description: Enter the name for your server.

Config.Name: Server Password
Config.Description: Enter the password for your server.

Config.Name: Server Admin Password
Config.Description: Enter the admin password for your server.

Config.Name: RCON Password
Config.Description: Enter the RCON password for your server.

Config.Name: Admin List
Config.Description: Enter a comma-delimited list of SteamIDs to specify admins.

Config.Name: Scenario ID
Config.Description: Enter the scenario the server will run.

Config.Name: Max Players
Config.Description: Enter the max amount of players for your server.

Config.Name: Max FPS
Config.Description: Enter the max FPS the server will run at.

Config.Name: Validate Installation
Config.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Config.Name: Game Port
Config.Description: UDP Game Port (If you need another port delete this entry and create a new UDP port mapping here in the template with the Container and Host port set.

Config.Name: RCON Port
Config.Description: UDP RCON Port (If you need another port delete this entry and create a new UDP port mapping here in the template with the Container and Host port set.

Config.Name: A2S Port
Config.Description: UDP A2S Port (If you need another port delete this entry and create a new UDP port mapping here in the template with the Container and Host port set.

Config.Name: Steam-Username
Config.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Config.Name: Steam-Password
Config.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).
